question: Culture medium for campylobactor jejuni -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Skirrow's medium Media for Campvlobactoro Preston mediao Campylobactor agar baseo Skirrow*s mediao Butzlers mediao Aka Balton mediao Karmali agaro Columbia blood agaro Campylobactor enrichment broth, o CCDA (Charcol-cefoperazone-deoxycholate agar)o CVA (Cefoperazone, Vancomycin and amphotericin B)

question: Culture medium for campylobactor Jej uni -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Skirrow's medium Media for Campylobactoro Preston mediao Campylobactor agar baseo Skirrow's mediao Butzler's mediao Aka Balton mediao Karmah agaro Columbia blood agaro Campylobactor enrichment broth, o CCDA (Charcol-cefoperazone-deoxycholate agar)o CVA (Cefoperazone, Vancomycin and amphotericin B)
